# Source: https://github.com/TigerVNC/tigervnc/wiki

Welcome to the TigerVNC wiki! Let\'s go

This wiki is to be used as a place where everyone can contribute useful documentation on how to use TigerVNC. Anyone is free to add and improve the content here. Right now there isn\'t terribly much here, but feel free to add what you feel is needed.

General information about the project can be found on [our main page](http://tigervnc.org).

# User 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#user)

-   [Setup TigerVNC server (Windows)](/TigerVNC/tigervnc/wiki/Setup-TigerVNC-server-%28Windows%29)
-   [Secure your connection](/TigerVNC/tigervnc/wiki/Secure-your-connection)

# Development 

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](#development)

Developers should look at our [Development](/TigerVNC/tigervnc/wiki/Development) section for information on how to best contribute to this project.

The wiki is read-only because of malware spam that GitHub refuses to provide protection agains. Contact the maintainers directly with changes you\'d like to make.
